translation.en: Where go you, my friend?
You're crawling in the wrong direction.
That wind you feel is coming from England.
Scotland's that way.
My lords.
I'm most sorry for making you wait.
I know you've traveled far and from great travail.
I pray you will know that this time of civil unrest...
consumes me... day and night.
I understand...
battle with the rebel Scots was hard fought.
translation.zh: ‎与苏格兰叛军的战斗非常艰辛

translation.en: It was, my liege.
-We lost some 300 men. -[exhales deeply]
Good Hotspur... you led the charge.
translation.zh: ‎英勇的热刺 你领导了冲锋

translation.en: Were any prisoners of note taken?
translation.zh: ‎俘获了什么值得注意的战俘吗？

translation.en: Many.
-Are they in train? -No.
And why is that? Why have they not been brought to me directly?
Why will you not pay cousin Mortimer's ransom?
translation.zh: ‎你为何不愿付表亲莫蒂默的赎金？

translation.en: You'll need to speak up, my boy.
I'm an old man.
My ears... are filled with hair.
Cousin Mortimer is held by the rebels of Wales.
translation.zh: ‎表亲莫蒂默在威尔士叛军手里

translation.en: Why do you refuse to pay his ransom?
I refuse to pay Mortimer's ransom
because I refuse to believe him a prisoner.
I rather believe Mortimer a traitor.
He has joined the Welsh rebels.
He has betrayed England and is now an enemy of mine,
translation.zh:
‎他已经背叛了英格兰
‎现在是我的敌人

translation.en: and, therefore, of yours.
You agree with my précis, young Hotspur?
translation.zh: ‎我这么说 你同意吗 小热刺？

translation.en: -No. -[Northumberland] My son--
I believe yours to be the ramblings of a crazy old demon.
translation.zh: ‎你这说法是老疯子的胡言乱语

translation.en: Harry, please, stop this.
[King Henry IV] Oh, no, let him speak.
-I wish to hear him. -[Northumberland] My liege--
translation.zh:
‎我想听听看 ‎-陛下…
‎-你这是老人的胡言乱语

translation.en: Yours are the ramblings of an old man so saturated with malice and mistrust
translation.zh:
‎-陛下…
‎-你这是老人的胡言乱语 ‎满是恶意和猜忌

translation.en: that he no longer knows up from down,
can no longer see beyond the walls of his own monstrous schloss.
translation.zh: ‎已经是巨大城堡城墙内的井底之蛙

translation.en: My family have served you.
We aided you in your ascension, and still we fight for you.
translation.zh: ‎助你走上王位 现今依然为你而战

translation.en: Cousin Mortimer has fought for you.
And yet, now, whilst you slobber over that chicken's wing,
he shivers in a western prison
translation.zh: ‎而他却在西边的监狱里颤抖

translation.en: awaiting mutilation at the hands of Welsh witches.
translation.zh: ‎而他却在西边的监狱里颤抖 ‎等待威尔士女巫的摧残

translation.en: [Northumberland] My liege... you must excuse my son.
He needs rest.
We come only... to advocate for your help in securing Mortimer's release.
translation.zh:
‎我们来此 仅是为了向您求助
‎确保莫蒂默获释

translation.en: All that we've done for you we have done for the good of England.
translation.zh:
‎我们为你做的一切
‎都是为了英格兰好

translation.en: But our lands are now more riven with war than ever before.
translation.zh: ‎但我们的土地却从未如此般烽火连天

translation.en: The Scots aren't finished. The Welsh have only just begun.
translation.zh:
‎苏格兰军尚未击溃
‎威尔士军已揭竿而起

translation.en: And for what?
Why do you think this might be, old man?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得是因为什么 老头子？

translation.en: Who do you imagine might be to blame for this?
Chickens can't fly.
But I've seen one...
eke enough wing flap to clear a fence.
Then it's free.
But then so too are the foxes.
You are right, young Percy. I owe you much.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 小珀西 我欠你许多

translation.en: I owe your family still more.
But if the Scottish traitors you've taken prisoner
translation.zh: ‎但如果那些被你俘虏的苏格兰叛徒

translation.en: are not brought to me as speedily as they might travel,
translation.zh: ‎没有以最快速度带到我跟前

translation.en: I will hang you by your fucking neck.
translation.zh: ‎那我一定会让你上他妈的绞刑架

translation.en: Has this been heard, young Percy?
Your Majesty, please forgive us.
What a venomous boy.
He'll betray me now. I'm sure of it.
If only he were my son.
[Falstaff] Hal.
[Falstaff] Hal?
Hal.
-[Falstaff grunts] -What is it? Falstaff has injured hisself.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？
‎-法斯塔夫伤到自己了

translation.en: Yeah. See?
-How did you get inside? -[Falstaff] The door was ajar.
It was not.
[Falstaff] Yes, it was. It was ajar.
It was not ajar.
Well, how else might we gain entry?
Are you accusing me of having cut myself a secret key?
translation.zh:
‎你是在说
‎我给自己秘密地做了把钥匙？

translation.en: Yes.
Falstaff has injured hisself, Hal. Will you perform the small repairs?
translation.zh:
‎法斯塔夫受伤了 哈尔
‎你要给他修复一下吗？

translation.en: No.
[Beale] Oh, no.
Your Highness.
[grunts] There's a fresh coin in this for you, you know.
I don't want your coin.
I will require your undiminished loyalty from here till Megiddo.
translation.zh: ‎我要的是远到天际分毫不减的忠诚

translation.en: You have that already.
You're a soft negotiator.
[yelps] Hey! You're wasting good wine.
-I'm keeping it clean. -Give it.
Oh. That looks very hot.
[Falstaff] Do it.
Prince Henry.
Who are you?
We come from the royal court. We wish to speak with you privately.
translation.zh:
‎我们是朝廷的人
‎希望能与您私下谈谈

translation.en: For what?
Please, sire. Privately.
Oh, privately, in the middle of Eastcheap?
Should I make a quick up and down and request a mass covering of ears?
translation.zh:
‎要我去快速跑一圈
‎叫大家捂住耳朵吗？

translation.en: Please, sire.
What is this?
Your father, His Majesty King--
Your father, His Majesty King Henry, is ill.
translation.zh: ‎您父亲 亨利国王陛下 病了

translation.en: He requests your presence.
Hmm. I suggest you return to the palace directly
and tell him his request was wholly ignored.
translation.zh: ‎告诉他 我完全无视他的要求

translation.en: I've been instructed to deliver the request with great urgency.
translation.zh: ‎我受令传达 这一要求非常急迫

translation.en: You might tell him the urgency was also wholly ignored.
translation.zh: ‎你可以告诉他 我也完全无视急迫性

translation.en: [whispers] My lady. My lady, it's time to leave.
-Why? -[shushes]
The day has begun. See?
-Out there. -[small exhale] It is well underway.
-[groans] -You might miss it.
Get up now. It's important that you leave.
translation.zh: ‎快起来吧 你必须得走了

translation.en: -Up. That's the spirit. -[groans]
Now, lift your arms.
Very good.
You must get that door fixed.
What is it?
Visit with your father.
Go away.
If your father is indeed
gravely ill enough to request your presence,
then you must visit with him.
It should be better to regret having done so than it would to have not.
translation.zh: ‎后悔去见他 ‎总比后悔没去要好

translation.en: If your father is ill,
translation.zh:
‎如果你父亲病了
‎无论你对他有何感觉

translation.en: no matter your feelings for him, you must visit with him.
translation.zh:
‎如果你父亲病了
‎无论你对他有何感觉 ‎你都得去看看他

translation.en: But...
I say this not out of concern for our king's well-being,
translation.zh: ‎我说这个 不是因为关心国王的健康

translation.en: but more for fear of the drunken soak to which you'll be likely to succumb
translation.zh: ‎而是担心 如果你没有听从他的召唤

translation.en: should you fail to heed his call and he were to die
translation.zh: ‎而他真的死了 你没能分到一杯羹

translation.en: without you having squared your ledger.
translation.zh: ‎那你可能就要屈服于某个醉鬼了

translation.en: I fear that would be soak enough to put even me to shame.
translation.zh: ‎醉醺醺的程度 恐怕连我都自愧不如

translation.en: Do it.
If nothing else I ever suggest.
[archbishop] While I see the strain your treasury is under,
I cannot help but wonder if the canker of Lollardy
translation.zh: ‎我不禁想是否是腐败的罗拉德派

translation.en: be at the root of this suggestion that the church be burdened with a tax
translation.zh: ‎提出了建议说 ‎要对教会征收赋税 用以解决

translation.en: to relieve problems that are not of the church's making.
translation.zh: ‎要对教会征收赋税 用以解决 ‎并非因教会而导致的问题

translation.en: Your Majesty.
Henry, Prince of Wales.
[King Henry IV] My son.
Come in.
I feel my life nearing its natural end, and yet, still...
translation.zh: ‎我感觉自己生命正走向自然的终点

translation.en: even I must appear of ruder health than you.
The time has come for us to consider...
the issue of...
my succession.
You will not be king.
While you are my eldest son,
for reasons that are on display for all here to see,
translation.zh: ‎但在场的各位也都能看得到

translation.en: smell...
you will not inherit this crown.
Nor have I sought it.
That privilege and responsibility
will instead fall to your brother Thomas.
He is soft, but he is eager.
translation.zh: ‎虽然他很温软 但他很有渴望

translation.en: He will lead my army against the newly treasonous Harry Percy.
translation.zh:
‎他将领导我的大军
‎对抗新的叛贼珀西

translation.en: I will assume that this news comes as neither surprise nor disappointment.
translation.zh:
‎我想这消息既不让你惊讶
‎也不让你失望

translation.en: But it is my duty as king,
and father...
to say it to you directly.
When do you fight?
I set off tomorrow.
We fight by week's end.
You need not fight.
These feuds need not be yours.
[King Henry IV] I have said...
what you were summonsed to hear.
Leave us now.
-Your Highness. -Stop.
-Your Highness. -Stop.
Lord Dorset.
Are your men ready for the day?
They are, sire.
Very good.
Tell me of your preparations.
My lord.
Why are you here?
I will not allow this havoc to transpire.
I've come to see it stopped.
This is my battle.
If I have my way, there will be no battle.
translation.zh: ‎按我的方法 不会有战役

translation.en: You. Come here.
-[man] My lord. -You have no place here.
Go to the rebel camp,
deliver the following message to Percy Hotspur.
Tell him that Prince Henry challenges him to settle today's score man on man.
translation.zh: ‎就说亨利亲王向他提出一对一挑战

translation.en: He and I.
We will fight in our armies' places.
translation.zh: ‎我们两人代替各自军队战斗

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
Who do you think you are?
I am nobody to you.
translation.zh: ‎对你来说 我什么都不是

translation.en: I will fight him.
And I will defeat him.
That you surely would, my son.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定可以打败他 孩子

translation.en: But it cannot be.
The prince speaks not for his father.
You are eager to fight, my son.
And you will.
And we shall fight alongside you.
We will burn them.
We will burn Henry's reign to the ground.
translation.zh: ‎会把亨利的统治一把火烧掉

translation.en: -[Thomas] You have no place here. -You do not know war, Thomas.
translation.zh: ‎这里没有你的位置 ‎你不懂战争 托马斯

translation.en: -I do know war. -[Hal] You do not.
You've been recruited to our father's madness,
to wars that need not be fought.
These men are not our enemies.
-Our father has made them thus. -[Thomas] Why then are you here?
translation.zh: ‎是父亲把他们逼成这样 ‎那你来做什么？

translation.en: You so disapprove of our cause,
and yet, still, you find it necessary to upstage me.
translation.zh: ‎但却还是务必要来抢我的风头

translation.en: I do this not to steal your thunder, brother.
translation.zh: ‎我不是为了抢你风头 弟弟

translation.en: I do it to save your life.
[man] Pardon me, my lords.
Our herald is returned from the rebel camp.
They have refused Prince Henry's offer.
translation.zh: ‎他们拒绝了亨利亲王的提议

translation.en: They want battle.
Where is Henry?
I come to fight him in our armies' stead.
No.
His offer was refused.
The offer has been reconsidered.
I said... [shouts] no!
Why is the little dog barking?
[yells] Where be the big dog?
It will be done.
And here I am with the whoring fool.
This fight need not be had, Percy.
My father will soon be dead. Your grievances will die with him.
translation.zh:
‎我父亲活不久了
‎你也不必再心怀怨恨

translation.en: Don't be afraid of our small contest, young Hal.
translation.zh: ‎我们小小打一场 不要害怕 小哈尔

translation.en: I promise to finish it quickly.
Your father...
is plague to England.
Come for me, big dog!
Someday this will be your head, dropped at the feet of a man
translation.zh: ‎有一天 你的脑袋也会像这样 ‎被甩在可能是你兄弟的人的脚下

translation.en: who might otherwise have been your brother.
translation.zh: ‎被甩在可能是你兄弟的人的脚下

translation.en: Come with me now, Thomas, please.
Walk away from this field.
After you have stolen its prized scalp?
translation.zh:
‎就让你这么偷走
‎这颗重金悬赏的人头？

translation.en: This is what will be spoken of tomorrow.
[sighs] This field was mine.
It was to mark my dominion.
Instead now...
it marks only this head.
This fucking head!
Move.
-[Hooper] John. -[groans]
John.
Go away.
You might want to see to your otherwise well-appointed friend.
translation.zh:
‎你还是来看看
‎你这位装备完好的朋友吧

translation.en: He seems to have taken a pitiful turn.
[whispers] Beale.
Hal's up-chucked again.
Hello, friend.
Many times have I seen men in your state.
I've been in it many times over myself.
translation.zh: ‎我也曾经历过你这样的状态

translation.en: For all our rejoice of... courage and valor,
nothing stains the soul more indelibly than killing.
translation.zh:
‎但没什么事比杀戮
‎更能在灵魂上留下不可磨灭的污点

translation.en: Never have I felt so vile... than standing victorious on a battlefield.
translation.zh:
‎胜利地站在战场上时
‎也是我觉得最为邪恶肮脏的时刻

translation.en: The thrill of victory fades quickly.
What lingers long after... is always ugly.
translation.zh: ‎之后久久不肯散去的总是不堪的感觉

translation.en: Never again, I say.
[Hal] Stop talking, old man, please.
Please stop talking.
I will never stop talking, Hal.
translation.zh: ‎我永远不会闭嘴的 哈尔

translation.en: Never.
Never ever.
[William] Out.
[William] My lord.
What business?
[William] It is a matter of great urgency.
Mm. You should hurry along then.
Please, my lord.
It is your father.
He's dying.
Hmm, that hook has lost its worm.
[William] Wait outside.
No doubt...
your father has brought... much trouble to this kingdom,
translation.zh: ‎你父亲给王国带来了许多麻烦

translation.en: and I fear the chaos that might erupt in his absence.
translation.zh:
‎我担心他要是不在了
‎可能会爆发混乱

translation.en: England needs a king,
and I suspect those sentiments of yours
that had you resile from him
are precisely those the governance of this land needs.
translation.zh:
‎但那些观点
‎正是治理这片土地所需要的

translation.en: You must be king.
Why do you say this to me?
Speak to Thomas.
Is he not to be your new king?
I'm afraid that is not possible.
Your brother was killed in Wales.
After you defeated Percy Hotspur,
young Thomas pressed on to the western fields.
translation.zh: ‎小托马斯强行带兵进了西边战场

translation.en: This is where he met his end.
It is said he gave valiant account of himself.
translation.zh: ‎大家说 他战斗得很英勇

translation.en: [Hal yells] Where is he?!
Where is the monster?!
Move. Leave him.
The King needs rest.
-Soon he will have it. -He's dying.
translation.zh:
‎-他很快就能休息了
‎-他快死了

translation.en: Leave.
You feel this cold?
-Wretch. -[whimpers]
[weakly] Hal.
You must be king, Hal.
Please.
You must be king, Hal.
I know not what I have done.
You know not what will become of you.
So, I offer you this...
The most blessed reprieve,
the most dreadful misery.
You shall suffer the indignity of serving me,
translation.zh: ‎你们将蒙受屈辱 侍奉我

translation.en: the wayward son you so revile.
translation.zh: ‎这个让你们唾骂的任性孩子

translation.en: But know now you will be watched over by an altogether different king.
translation.zh:
‎但现在你们要知道
‎监督你们的是一个完全不同的国王

translation.en: What is this?
Who are you?
I am I.
Who are you?
[Lord Chamberlain] What is your purpose here?
I think you just woke me up from it, didn't you?
translation.zh: ‎你刚打扰了我睡觉的意图 不是吗？

translation.en: Rise from that bed at once.
Who are you?
Where is Hal?
These lodgings and their contents are the property of the King of England.
translation.zh:
‎这些房子和里面的东西
‎均为英格兰国王之财产

translation.en: You are trespassing and I order you to vacate at once.
translation.zh:
‎你这是非法侵入
‎我命令你立刻出去

translation.en: What King of England?
Amen.
[archbishop] All hail King Henry.
[crowd] King Henry! King Henry! King Henry!
King Wenceslaus of Bohemia
presents this gift to King Henry of England.
translation.zh: ‎向英格兰之亨利国王献上此礼

translation.en: To long and good health.
Beautiful.
I'm sure you all know...
my young sister Philippa has joined us here today.
translation.zh: ‎我妹妹菲莉帕 丹麦王后

translation.en: Queen of Denmark.
I'm thankful she and her husband,
the good King Eric, have traveled all this way.
translation.zh: ‎好国王埃里克一路远行而来

translation.en: I wish for you take this vase, my dear.
translation.zh: ‎希望你收下这个花瓶 宝贝妹妹

translation.en: Let its beauty stand for your beauty, which stands in turn for England's beauty.
translation.zh:
‎让花瓶的美代表你的美
‎这也是代表着英格兰之美

translation.en: I thank you, my lord.
[Lord Chamberlain] His Serenity, the doge of the Republic of Venice,
present this gift in your honor, my liege.
-It says it is a bird from Constantinople. -[King Henry V] A bird?
translation.zh: ‎信中称这是来自君士坦丁堡的一只鸟 ‎鸟？应该已经死了吧

translation.en: A dead one, I should suppose.
If I may, my liege.
Unnatural mechanics from the edge of Christendom.
translation.zh: ‎基督教世界边缘的非自然机械物

translation.en: [King Henry V] A wonder.
This belongs to my cousin, Cambridge.
translation.zh: ‎这要归属于我的表哥 坎布里奇

translation.en: Of all at this table, none have I known longer than I have you.
translation.zh: ‎桌边所有人中 我认识你最久

translation.en: Indeed I have known you longer than I have my own young sister.
We were raised together. You're like an older brother to me.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起长大 你对我就像哥哥一般

translation.en: So, I think it only fitting that you should have this magical bird.
translation.zh: ‎将这只魔法鸟赠你 再自然不过了

translation.en: Let's hope its magic isn't black and unholy.
translation.zh: ‎希望其魔法并非不圣洁的黑魔法

translation.en: [Lord Chamberlain] From the Dauphin,
son of His Majesty, Charles, King of France.
translation.zh: ‎法国国王查理陛下的王太子

translation.en: A ball.
There is no accompanying message from the Dauphin?
No, my liege.
I shall keep this gift.
This one is sent only for me.
For the boy I once was.
The ball is an insult to you and to your kingdom.
translation.zh: ‎这颗球是在侮辱您和您的王国

translation.en: You must respond.
Remember where, as prince, I whiled and how I spent my days?
translation.zh: ‎记得我还是亲王时是如何度日的吗？

translation.en: [William] You spent them in considered privation.
translation.zh: ‎是经过考虑之后匮乏物质的生活

translation.en: Drinking, clowning.
So, is there not some truth in this jest?
If the Dauphin wants from me a paroxysm, why give it him?
translation.zh:
‎法国王太子想让我爆发
‎那为什么要让他得逞？

translation.en: It would not be a show of foul temper
for you to respond forcefully to an insult such as that.
translation.zh:
‎作出有力回应
‎显示出的并非是您的坏脾气

translation.en: It would be a show of strength.
I appreciate your umbrage, William,
translation.zh: ‎我很感激你为此事生气 威廉

translation.en: but my strength does not lie in me flapping up and down at the slightest barb like...
translation.zh:
‎但我的力量不在于
‎别人有丁点讽刺就上蹿下跳

translation.en: -some unholy mechanical bird. -Mm.
Make sense of this. This is what is pressing.
translation.zh: ‎想想这个吧 这事才紧急

translation.en: Civil strife has consumed us.
The war drains the purse like little else.
translation.zh: ‎战争所耗巨资 无其他事可比

translation.en: This strife must end.
And it will end... by conciliation.
We shall pardon our adversaries.
And we shall pay Mortimer's ransom and have him returned from Wales.
translation.zh:
‎要支付莫蒂默的赎金
‎让他从威尔士回来

translation.en: I will write these pardons in mine own hand.
I want it known these sentiments are so personal to me.
translation.zh:
‎我要让人知道
‎这些观点是我个人的想法

translation.en: We shall let these men know they were my father's enemies, not mine.
translation.zh:
‎我们要让这些人知道
‎他们是我父亲的敌人 不是我的敌人

translation.en: [William] Certainly, my liege.
How does this strategy greet you?
Great reforms are best enacted with regime change.
translation.zh: ‎政权变更时是颁布大改革的最佳时机

translation.en: If this is how you wish to proceed,
then, yes, my liege,
now is the time to do it.
Did you reconcile with our father before his death?
translation.zh: ‎父亲去世前 你跟他和解了吗？

translation.en: There was no reconciliation to be had.
He did untold harm to this kingdom.
translation.zh: ‎他对这个王国造成了数不清的伤害

translation.en: His death will bring calm with it.
translation.zh: ‎他死了 事情也就宁静了

translation.en: I ask not after the kingdom.
What of you?
I want an end to this unrest.
Look around that table last night.
Look at the faces of the men seated at it.
I can feel this calm of which you speak.
translation.zh: ‎我能感受到你说的这份宁静

translation.en: I do believe they wish you well.
But I also see that they have their own kingdoms behind their eyes.
translation.zh:
‎但我也看到
‎他们眼里也有自己的王国

translation.en: Do you understand what I say?
I've been away too many years and I'm now to return to Denmark.
translation.zh: ‎虽然我已离开多年 现又要返回丹麦

translation.en: But I have, in my time in that court, been privy to its commissions.
translation.zh: ‎但我在朝廷期间 很了解内幕情况

translation.en: I have seen there, again and again, that no one ever speaks true, wholly true.
translation.zh:
‎我已一次又一次看到
‎没人会说实话 完完全全的实话

translation.en: Choose your steps wisely, dear brother.
[archbishop] I speak to Charles of France's claim
to be the legitimate sovereign ruler of said lands.
translation.zh: ‎主张是上述土地的合法主权者

translation.en: It is said that the Salic law would have no succession
translation.zh:
‎根据萨利克法
‎若法国王冠落在女人手上

translation.en: if the French crown fall to a woman.
Meaning, no rule left in the lineage of the female
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 女性家族之统治权

translation.en: shall, by rights, pass to her issue.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 女性家族之统治权 ‎不可传给她的子嗣

translation.en: Now, the law Salic, which is of Frankish land
and tethered to said lands is not--
translation.zh: ‎并且牵扯到上述土地的萨利克法

translation.en: not therefore legally bound or adherent at all, in fact,
translation.zh:
‎并不能合法约束
‎或者说其实完全不能用于

translation.en: to the lands of France, but to those of Francia,
translation.zh: ‎法国之土地 而是弗朗西亚之土地

translation.en: which, as you know, lies between the rivers of Elbe and Saale.
translation.zh: ‎也就是易北河与萨勒河之间

translation.en: I claim here, with proof, that hence it follows that the law Salic,
translation.zh:
‎我在此带着证据主张
‎其遵从萨利克法

translation.en: which has seen French sovereignty stolen as such from a true lineage--
translation.zh: ‎法国主权从真正家系手里夺走了…

translation.en: Thrice, as I can illuminate, the French have cited the law Salic
translation.zh: ‎我记得 法国三次援引萨利克法

translation.en: -as reason to bar a female succession-- -With reverence.
translation.zh:
‎-来禁止女性继承…
‎-冒昧打断一下

translation.en: Yes, my liege?
I'm finding this story impossible to follow.
My liege, I question the so-called French king's claim
translation.zh: ‎陛下 我是质疑所谓的法国国王

translation.en: to the throne upon which he sits.
Is that so?
What confuses me now is why you are telling me this story.
translation.zh:
‎我不明白的是
‎你为什么现在跟我说这故事

translation.en: My liege, I simply aim to bolster your claim to France
translation.zh: ‎陛下 我只是想增强您对法国的主张

translation.en: should the need to meet her with force soon arise.
translation.zh: ‎以防未来很快需要以武力面对它

translation.en: And you believe that need will indeed soon arise?
translation.zh: ‎你认为未来很快会有此需要？

translation.en: I-- [chuckles]
My liege...
by way of preparedness,
-I believe it always wise-- -Preparedness?
translation.zh: ‎做好准备总是明智的… ‎做好准备？

translation.en: If we are to war with France, it will not come as a consequence
translation.zh:
‎就算我们要与法国开战
‎也不会是因为

translation.en: of an old and impenetrable madrigal.
France was your father's long-held ambition.
translation.zh: ‎法国是您父亲长久以来的雄心目标

translation.en: Had he not been bogged in civil feud,
he would most surely have taken the fight to her.
And then... on to Jerusalem.
Jerusalem?
We're all the way to the Holy Land, are we?
And presumably to sack the rest of Christendom along the way.
translation.zh:
‎而且大概一路会沦陷
‎基督教世界的其他地方

translation.en: I am not my father, archbishop.
translation.zh: ‎我和我父亲不一样 大主教

translation.en: I would have thought this to be clear by now.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为你已经清楚这一点了

translation.en: [William] We must forgive our archbishop.
He is a far... [exhales] far from gifted orator.
Which is strange, given I would have thought gifted oratory
translation.zh: ‎这很奇怪 我本以为要当大主教

translation.en: to be a requirement of the position.
Why is the archbishop speaking to me of war with France?
translation.zh:
‎为什么大主教要跟我说
‎与法国开战的事？

translation.en: What we are witnessing is a stirring, of which we must be wary.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在看到的是一种征兆
‎必须小心谨慎

translation.en: I applaud... your restraint.
After so many years of strife,
you are proving to be more than your father's son.
translation.zh:
‎您证明自己
‎不仅只是您父亲的儿子而已

translation.en: You wish to be a king for the people.
translation.zh: ‎您希望成为心怀人民的国王

translation.en: Now, we must ensure to that end, however,
translation.zh: ‎但是 为此 我们必须保证

translation.en: you do not remain oblivious to the mood of the people.
And what mood is this?
That France is taunting us.
Do you share this mood?
this mood is a fantasy.
But that does not mean it is not felt true.
-[Beale] Where are you going? -[Falstaff groans] Disgusting.
-No, we can't be going to Hooper's. -Yes, we can.
translation.zh: ‎不行 不能去胡柏那里 ‎可以去

translation.en: -No, she won't have you. -Yes, she will.
-[Hooper] Nope! -Yes.
-[Hooper] No. -Yes!
-You're not welcome here. -[grunts]
Unless you've come to pay me what you owe me.
[Falstaff] I have paid you.
You've paid me a snatch of what you owe.
And I presume, too, from the proceeds of thieving.
[Falstaff] Lies.
By all account, you be not specially good at thieving neither.
translation.zh: ‎据大家说 你盗窃手法也不怎么样

translation.en: Lies.
How dare you address me so?
Why would you be so churlish
translation.zh: ‎最可能让你离开这肮脏鼠洞的人是我

translation.en: with the very man most likely to lift you from your stinking rat hole?
translation.zh: ‎最可能让你离开这肮脏鼠洞的人是我 ‎你怎么对我如此无礼？

translation.en: Oh, maybe you've forgot.
My associations now stretch to the highest reaches of the realm.
translation.zh: ‎我现在的人脉延伸至了王国最高端

translation.en: Your insolence might as well be directed to the king himself.
translation.zh:
‎你这样傲慢对我
‎也就是在傲慢对待国王本尊

translation.en: Ponder that now.
[Hooper] Are you speaking of Hal?
Where is he?
-[Falstaff exhales] -Where is Hal?
Where's our king?
He be gone weeks and weeks now. Where is he?
translation.zh: ‎他现在好几周不见人 他在哪？

translation.en: -[clears throat] -I would say... -[sighs] -you be the one that's been forgot.
translation.zh: ‎我说 被忘却的人是你吧

translation.en: -Oh. -I would say that your dalliance with the upper reaches of the realm
was short-lived in and around his stinking sick bucket.
translation.zh: ‎也就短暂存在于他恶臭的病桶周围

translation.en: Seems you were little more than passing keeper of a prince's puke.
translation.zh:
‎看来你不仅只是
‎保管亲王的呕吐物而已

translation.en: -[laughter] -Shut up.
Ponder that now.
Nell, Sir John is down on his luck.
I am not.
You find someone to pay your way here.
I'll not be paying it for you.
[man] Head.
[in French] Who are you?
He seeks asylum in return for his tale.
I do not doubt this can be arranged.
[in French] Can it or not? You are the King, no?
[in French] It can be arranged.
I have been sent by the King of France to assassinate you.
Charles himself sent you?
You know this to be certain?
[Gilrich] The order's origin I know, yes.
From the King.
What was the order?
That I should kill the King of England.
How?
There are many ways to kill a man.
It is my talent...
killing men who do not expect to be killed.
[in English] At such a time as I endeavor to foster a fresh and peaceful air
translation.zh: ‎此时我努力要 ‎在王国营造新鲜和平的空气

translation.en: for this kingdom to breathe,
translation.zh: ‎在王国营造新鲜和平的空气

translation.en: it is not in my interest to stir hostility with another.
translation.zh: ‎与其他王国为敌 不符合我的利益

translation.en: This is an act of war.
[William] We share your longing for peace, my liege,
translation.zh: ‎我们理解您对和平的渴望 陛下

translation.en: but to ignore such an audacious act of aggression
translation.zh: ‎但要是对此般大胆侵犯行为无动于衷

translation.en: will be seen as weakness.
This is no game ball. This is an assassin.
Would you consider me weak, Chief Justice?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我软弱吗 大法官？

translation.en: No.
No, I speak more of the kingdom.
What the kingdom sees.
What the kingdom sees. Mm.
How, pray, might the kingdom see the weasel beneath our feet?
translation.zh:
‎但王国子民
‎怎么会看到我们脚下的叛徒？

translation.en: If France's animus towards you
runs deep enough for them to send an assassin,
it will be felt in the street, ours and theirs.
translation.zh:
‎那街头人民会感觉到这股敌意
‎英法两国都是

translation.en: It will be known.
We share your concerns.
But peace today needs more than harmony.
translation.zh: ‎但当下的和平需要的不仅是和谐

translation.en: It needs strength... and confidence.
These are qualities that can originate only in you,
the king.
Our king.
Take down these words...
addressed to King Charles of France.
This assassin you send
can be taken as nothing other than an infant act of war.
If this be your intention,
I say you let it be known plainly
and that you desist from this timorous slither
in which you presently engage.
If it be war you seek,
send the full weight of your army.
For a lone, cowardly assassin
will not topple this King Henry the Fifth of England
translation.zh: ‎休想打倒堂堂英格兰国王亨利五世

translation.en: you so underestimate.
Fill this with gunstones and send it back to France.
-[Cambridge] Who is it? -A Frenchman, sire.
He says he wishes to speak with you privately.
About what?
[man] He wouldn't say, sire.
I asked of him, he wouldn't say.
My king has sent me to seek out men he feels he can trust.
translation.zh:
‎我国国王派我来寻找
‎他觉得能信任的人

translation.en: He believes there is discreet discussion to be had.
What discussion?
He believes there is discussion to be had about your new king of England.
translation.zh: ‎他想可以讨论你们新任英格兰国王

translation.en: [Cambridge] Only myself and Lord Grey were met.
We knew not where to turn about what was spoken to us.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知该找谁说说
‎他们对我们说的话

translation.en: [Grey] We're all of us aware there's a standing problem.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道现在有一个问题

translation.en: Our king is of low repute.
The French king... teaches you this?
Is he not thankful
for our young Henry's light reaction to his provocation?
translation.zh: ‎亨利对他的挑衅并无强烈反应吗？

translation.en: The assassin he swears he knows not of.
'Tis a charge he denies.
His plot came to naught.
Of course he would wish to wipe his hands of it.
[Cambridge] Whatever the root,
they have expressed grave concern
regarding our king's mental fortitude.
translation.zh: ‎对我们国王心理坚毅的严重顾虑

translation.en: This envoy is to be trusted, is he not, Cambridge?
translation.zh: ‎这位信使可以信任 对吗 坎布里奇？

translation.en: I believe so.
Charles wishes to dethrone our king.
The issue is not France.
This is but a reminder to us of a more general lunacy.
translation.zh:
‎这不过是提醒了我们
‎一个更加普遍的愚蠢行为

translation.en: A boy who but weeks ago was a drunken boor
translation.zh: ‎几周前这小子还是粗野酒鬼

translation.en: from the sewers of Eastcheap now wears England's crown.
-Hmm. -[Grey] What shall become of us?
What shall become of us when civil misdeeds are forgiven
translation.zh: ‎要是王室罪行宛如失检一般受到宽恕

translation.en: as if they were but indiscretions?
-When traitors-- -Yes, yes, Lord Grey, your--
translation.zh:
‎-叛徒…
‎-是 格雷大人 你…

translation.en: Your concerns are current.
And they are numerous.
Something must be done.
Something will be done.
Give me quiet.
[William] Thus is a king's burden.
A king must make decisions
lesser men are... neither willing nor able to make.
translation.zh: ‎下层人不愿或不能做出的决定

translation.en: A king is indeed presented with quandaries
lesser men might never encounter in the course of their whole lives.
translation.zh: ‎下层人可能一辈子都不会遇到

translation.en: I wish it were not so.
But problems...
And this is my experience.
Problems that are left unattended...
have a habit of becoming crises.
You have a chance here to unite the land, Hal.
translation.zh: ‎你现在有机会团结这片土地 哈尔

translation.en: Truly.
You have refreshed its mood with promise.
translation.zh: ‎你用承诺 让这片土地有了新的念想

translation.en: But promise must be fulfilled.
Promise can never be an end in itself.
As of this day, we're at war with France.
translation.zh: ‎今天起 我们对法国开战

translation.en: Twice I have given her the benefit of my doubt.
This third affront will not be left unchecked.
translation.zh: ‎这第三次冒犯 不能置之不理了

translation.en: And so, in order to flush these French rats from their nests,
translation.zh: ‎为了把这些法国耗子从巢中冲出来

translation.en: I will have it communicated to them that we are now at war.
translation.zh: ‎我会通告他们 我们开战了

translation.en: My Lord Grey.
Cambridge.
I would ask you to deliver this message to France, given your...
translation.zh: ‎我本想请你们去传信给法国 毕竟…

translation.en: familiarity with its recipient.
But I believe in the morning you be otherwise engaged.
translation.zh:
‎但我想到了早上
‎你们还有其他事要做

translation.en: Pray how, my liege?
Tomorrow you will have your heads cut off.
No.
I have chosen to send you as an advance party to Hell
translation.zh: ‎我已决定让你们先行前往地狱

translation.en: for the considerable French number
translation.zh: ‎因为很快会有数不清的法国人

translation.en: that will soon be needing to find space there.
You were once my friend.
I am your friend...
cousin.
All leave.
Now.
You.
Stay.
You...
leave.
This is my place.
[King Henry V] The hostess can stay.
I will not jump to your attention.
[inhales] And surely not to retread vile ground
I vowed never to walk again.
translation.zh: ‎我曾发誓永不回归的邪恶地

translation.en: I acknowledge my neglect of you, John.
translation.zh: ‎我承认是我疏忽了你 约翰

translation.en: A new chapter of my life has begun before the last could be properly closed.
translation.zh:
‎我的人生未能好好关上前一章
‎就已经开始了新的一章

translation.en: These concerns are mine and mine alone.
But the fact that this here be the first occasion
I've had to sound them aloud to anyone other than myself
speaks volumes.
It speaks to the loneliness of the position in which I find myself.
translation.zh: ‎证明我在现在这个位置的孤独

translation.en: To steer our present course,
I've been forced to rely upon the counsel of men
whose loyalty I question every waking moment.
translation.zh:
‎在我醒着的每时每刻
‎我都在怀疑他们的忠诚

translation.en: Every waking moment.
I need men around me I can trust.
translation.zh: ‎我身边需要有可以信任的人

translation.en: I'm here because you are my friend.
translation.zh: ‎我来这里是因为你是我朋友

translation.en: A king has no friends.
A king has only... followers... and foe.
I'm sorry my occasion to visit...
carries with it this doleful weight.
Hal.
I will come with you.
I ask only one favor in return.
[exhales] Square my account with that terrible hag...
translation.zh: ‎把我的账给那个臭婆娘清了吧

translation.en: over there. Would you?
[King Henry V] We welcome those newly arrived here.
Turn us now in common poise, with one mind, sharpened.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在是一个姿态 一条心

translation.en: Together...
we will bring France down.
Together...
we will bring her to her knees.
Captains all, to this end,
I wish to introduce to you a new marshal of our campaign.
translation.zh: ‎我向大家介绍一位新的元帅

translation.en: Sir John Falstaff.
Sir John's experience in battle should need no recitation.
You know of him.
Some of you have had the honor of fighting alongside him.
translation.zh: ‎一部分人有过跟他并肩作战的荣誉

translation.en: Others have heard tale of his exploits.
translation.zh: ‎其他人则听说过他的辉煌战绩

translation.en: But I have tasked Sir John to join this campaign
translation.zh: ‎但我请约翰爵士加入这场战争

translation.en: for one most vital reason alone:
he respects war
as only a man who has seen its most monstrous form can.
translation.zh: ‎只有见过其最怖面目之人才能做到

translation.en: He lusts after it not,
but rather regards it with the grim sobriety
translation.zh: ‎而是以庄严郑重之心来看待

translation.en: that you and your men should hope he would.
translation.zh: ‎你们和你们的手下都应该希望他如此

translation.en: Welcome, and thank you... [inhales] good sirs.
You're all well met.
Very good.
Are you ready for what awaits us?
translation.zh: ‎准备好面对等待我们的未来了吗？

translation.en: One is never ready for what awaits us.
translation.zh: ‎人永远无法准备好面对未来

translation.en: [man] Get!
You believe Sir John there to be fit and suitable enough
to captain this effort?
John is a good man.
[King Henry V] They meet us at sea or upon landing.
translation.zh: ‎要么海上迎战 要么登陆后战斗

translation.en: We shall know soon enough.
You must rest.
John.
Thank you.
What for?
For being here.
With me.
Well, it's a small price to pay
translation.zh: ‎能让讨厌的胡柏婆娘别来烦我

translation.en: to keep that detestable Hooper woman off me back.
Get some rest too, my liege.
We land quickly!
[man 1] Check every building.
[man 2] No man!
[man 3] Watch.
-[man 2] No man here! -[man 4] Clear!
[man] Go on. Faster.
[man] Light.
Pull!
Pull!
[Dorset] We must storm that castle.
It will be bloody. We will most surely sacrifice souls.
translation.zh: ‎会有人流血 ‎肯定也会有人牺牲灵魂

translation.en: Thus is the nature of war. It is bloody and soulless.
translation.zh:
‎这就是战争的本质
‎满地鲜血 没有灵魂

translation.en: -[scoffs] -We have no way of knowing how well supplied they are behind those walls.
translation.zh:
‎我们无法知道
‎他们在城墙后的补给有多充足

translation.en: This siege may take months,
and months, I fear, we have not at our disposal.
translation.zh: ‎但恐怕我们没有数月的时间可以消耗

translation.en: Men in these numbers, fixed here, will fall to hunger and disease.
translation.zh:
‎我们这么多人 留在这里
‎会被饥饿和疾病打倒

translation.en: Sir John.
War is...
bloody and soulless.
Yes.
The archbishop has arrived.
[archbishop] Surely you cannot simply idle here until they decide to come out?
translation.zh: ‎你们不能就这样干等着他们出来吧？

translation.en: That is precisely the definition of a siege.
How long might that take? Surely there's no way of knowing.
Uh, that too, is a common characteristic of a siege.
-I will not send my men up that hill. -But why in heavens not?
translation.zh:
‎-我不会派人到那山上去
‎-为什么？

translation.en: I will not sacrifice my men so flagrantly, nor so speculatively.
translation.zh:
‎我不会如此悍然、投机般地
‎牺牲我的手下

translation.en: Well, then why do you not simply go around?
If they insist on hiding in their castle, why do you not simply go around it?
translation.zh:
‎如果他们执意躲在城堡里
‎你为何不干脆绕过去？

translation.en: So well versed in the art of warfare.
[William] We must take this town, Archbishop.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须夺下此镇 大主教

translation.en: We must establish a garrison foothold here...
translation.zh: ‎我们必须在此设立驻军据点

translation.en: for our lines of supply from England.
translation.zh: ‎才能延续英格兰来的物资补给

translation.en: Do not forget that I have underwritten this campaign.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了我为这场战事提供了财力支持

translation.en: I have interest here.
And I will be heard.
Not today, Archbishop.
My liege.
They have surrendered.
-Our debate now, it seems, is for nothing. -Hmm.
As are the archbishop's bleatings.
[in French] The day is yours.
We ask only that our women and children be freed.
translation.zh: ‎我们只求妇女和儿童得到释放

translation.en: Many are hungry and wounded and becoming sick.
translation.zh: ‎许多人饥饿受伤 正在生病

translation.en: [in French] Upon full account of the castle, I see no reason to deny your request.
translation.zh: ‎占领了城堡 我无理由拒绝你的请求

translation.en: You will have tonight to oversee this evacuation
translation.zh: ‎今晚的时间 你们可以疏散他们

translation.en: and to corral your men prisoners.
translation.zh: ‎并且把你的手下作为俘虏关起来

translation.en: [in French] Come.
[Dorset] He wishes to slow us.
Who wishes to slow us?
We have received word that the Dauphin is en route.
translation.zh:
‎我们收到信息说
‎法国王太子在路上了

translation.en: He wishes conference with His Majesty.
And we know nothing of his purpose?
translation.zh: ‎我们对他的目的一无所知吗？

translation.en: We know only that he desires conference.
I would hope his purpose be to deliver his father's early surrender.
translation.zh:
‎希望他的目的是
‎传达他父亲早早投降的消息

translation.en: I strongly advise we disregard this word of his approach
translation.zh: ‎我强烈建议不顾他的嘴上把戏

translation.en: and ready our movement.
We must make advantage of their disarray.
Sir John, your counsel.
I've never met the man... this French prince.
translation.zh: ‎我从未见过这人 这个法国王太子

translation.en: I can't speak to his motivation.
[William] My liege.
He's here.
Your Majesty.
To... your little... victory.
Do you wonder why I have come?
Do you wonder this?
I have not come to offer you surrender
if that is what you are hoping.
I have come to describe for you
your end days,
the screams of your men
as they die slow.
And so, King of, uh, England,
you seem so intent on making France your new home,
translation.zh: ‎看来你好像很想让法国成为新家

translation.en: so let me help you.
I will drain your body of its blood
and bury it under a tree.
A little French tree.
Very young, very small.
Since perchance that is fitting of your mind for you to come here.
translation.zh: ‎也许这样才贴合你来此的心境

translation.en: Small.
And maybe your...
I mean, no, your balls must be big, no?
translation.zh: ‎不过 你这么有种 蛋蛋应该不小

translation.en: Giant balls.
Giant balls... with a tiny cock.
And the sound of your wives and children weeping
shall lull me to sleep at night.
Have you heard what I said?
I have.
It was stirring.
Sir John, please walk with me.
translation.zh: ‎约翰爵士 请和我去散散步

translation.en: Good night.
Ready the men to move.
Waste no time.
[boy] Run!
Hush, hush, hush. Hush. Hush.
Hello, little boy.
Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid.
I want you to deliver a gift to your king.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你给你们国王送个礼物

translation.en: Will you do this for me?
Good boy.
[man] No!
Double the guards to 20 yards through the night.
Three hours at a watch.
I want these men fresh and alert.
Any man caught sleeping will have his eyes gouged.
translation.zh:
‎值岗时要是睡觉
‎就把眼珠子挖出来

translation.en: Any caught speaking will lose his tongue.
translation.zh: ‎要是说话 就把舌头拔掉

translation.en: And I want all French prisoners in our train put to death.
translation.zh: ‎运送中的法国战俘 全部杀掉

translation.en: Leave their corpses speared on pikes by the river's edge.
translation.zh: ‎尸体用长矛刺穿 沿河边挂着

translation.en: [Falstaff] The first command I'll heed.
The second...
you'll have to carry out that mass execution yourself.
translation.zh: ‎就要您亲自执行大规模行刑了

translation.en: What did you say to me?
You are not that man.
How dare you defy me?
Show your feeling in here, with me.
-Don't let it outside this tent. -How dare you defy me? I am the king.
translation.zh:
‎-出了帐篷就别这样了
‎-你胆敢抗命？我是国王

translation.en: And where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff
translation.zh:
‎我听过不少故事的
‎那个令人闻风丧胆的

translation.en: about whom I've heard so much?
You've been mute since we crossed the sea.
translation.zh: ‎自我们过了海 你就一直很沉默

translation.en: I seem to be serving as my own chief tactician,
translation.zh: ‎似乎我才是自己的总战术官

translation.en: my own commander, my own counsel.
translation.zh: ‎自己的司令 自己的顾问

translation.en: Where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff?!
translation.zh:
‎那个令人闻风丧胆的
‎老战士法斯塔夫在哪？

translation.en: I speak only when there's something to be said.
translation.zh: ‎只有需要开口时 我才开口

translation.en: Too often have I seen men of war
invent work for themselves,
work that leads to nothing but vainglory and slaughtered men.
translation.zh:
‎这些事只会带来空虚荣誉
‎以及尸横遍野

translation.en: I'm not that man.
And this here is the war that you have chosen to wage.
I will disembowel you right here with mine own hand.
translation.zh: ‎我现在就能徒手把你开膛破肚了

translation.en: You are not that man, either.
[man 1] Evening, M'Lord.
-[Falstaff] Gentlemen. -[man 2] M'Lord.
Lord Dorset, summon your fastest rider.
translation.zh: ‎多塞特大人 召唤你最快的骑兵

translation.en: My liege.
Dartmouth!
[panting] Sires. What can I do for you?
Tell me what lies over that hill. Ride fast, return directly.
translation.zh: ‎去看看山那头的情况 速去速回

translation.en: We are both outnumbered and out-positioned.
They have the downslope in their favor.
Our need to advance puts us already at disadvantage.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要前进
‎这已经让我们处于劣势了

translation.en: The longer we wait, the larger their force will grow,
translation.zh: ‎我们等得越久 他们的势力就越大

translation.en: and with it, our disadvantage.
Your archers, my lord, are of superior faculty.
translation.zh: ‎大人 你手下的弓箭手能力非凡

translation.en: French crossbow is no match for an English longbow.
translation.zh: ‎法国弩不是英国长弓的对手

translation.en: We should hobble their number on first assault by these means alone.
translation.zh:
‎我们首次出击 单凭弓箭
‎就能让他们死伤惨重

translation.en: York's charge in center faces four lines of mounted knights.
Our archers here might weaken those by half. But--
translation.zh: ‎我们的弓箭手也许能拿下半数 但…

translation.en: But not eight lines.
Nine. Ten. More.
translation.zh: ‎九行 十行 更多更不行

translation.en: You speak true, my liege.
The longer we wait, the greater our disadvantage.
translation.zh: ‎我们等得越久 就越不利

translation.en: But it is possible our disadvantage has already grown insurmountable.
translation.zh: ‎但我们的劣势可能已经不可逾越了

translation.en: A great many men are already desperately ill
and weak from hunger.
What then, my lord, do you propose we do?
translation.zh: ‎那么 大人 你有何提议？

translation.en: I propose we consider turning back, my liege.
[stammers] I know it will not bring the outcome we desire,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 这样不是我们想要的结果

translation.en: but nor will the evisceration of our army.
translation.zh:
‎但军队受到重创
‎也不是我们想要的结果

translation.en: I'm reticent to speak for others here now,
translation.zh: ‎我无法代表在此诸位的想法

translation.en: but I'm certain my fears are shared.
translation.zh: ‎但我肯定大家都有和我一样的顾虑

translation.en: Who here agrees with Lord Dorset?
You can win this battle.
[Dorset] Is that so, Sir John?
Yes.
And precisely how is that so, Sir John?
translation.zh: ‎具体如何能做到 约翰爵士？

translation.en: You fight without horses and without armor.
translation.zh: ‎战斗时 不骑马 不穿盔甲

translation.en: Heavens above, please spare us from this man.
translation.zh: ‎我的老天 请让这人闭嘴吧

translation.en: [Falstaff] Their forward defense is a front line of mounted men.
translation.zh: ‎他们打头阵的防线都是骑士

translation.en: Many deep.
Knights all.
All on horseback, all with heavy armor.
translation.zh: ‎都在马背上 穿着重盔甲

translation.en: The ground out there...
is a flood bowl,
already half-sodden.
When it rains tonight, as I know it will,
translation.zh: ‎等到今晚下雨 我知道一定会下雨

translation.en: that ground will turn into a muddy bog.
And with their horses and their armor,
they will get stuck, they will fall,
translation.zh: ‎一定会陷入泥中 会摔倒

translation.en: and they will flounder like upturned beetles.
translation.zh: ‎会像翻过来的甲虫一样挣扎不已

translation.en: As shall we.
Not if we travel light,
without horses and without armor.
Speed and mobility will be our advantage.
translation.zh: ‎速度和移动性会让我们占优

translation.en: [Westmorland] And how, Sir John, can you be so sure of rainfall tonight?
translation.zh:
‎约翰爵士
‎你如何这么肯定今晚会下雨？

translation.en: My right knee is aching.
It only does that when rain is near.
Oh, save us, my liege. Please put a stop to this drivel.
translation.zh: ‎陛下 快让他停止说这种蠢话

translation.en: This would require their armored front line come meet us in the mud.
translation.zh:
‎这需要他们的盔甲前线
‎来泥地里迎战我们

translation.en: How do you propose we invite that?
A small forward armored attack of our own.
translation.zh: ‎我们派一小撮盔甲士兵出击

translation.en: A false advance.
They will counter.
We save our weight and our muscle for a nimble assault from the flanks.
translation.zh: ‎我们节省力气 敏捷地从侧面夹击

translation.en: They shan't be so easily deceived. They will not respond to false attack.
translation.zh:
‎他们不会那么轻易上当
‎不会对佯装进攻作出反应

translation.en: They will respond.
We move, they will meet us in the mud.
translation.zh: ‎我们出击 他们就会在泥地迎战我们

translation.en: Our men-at-arms are outnumbered. This they know.
translation.zh: ‎他们也知道我们的人数不占优

translation.en: They will hope to overwhelm us, so they will meet us with full force,
translation.zh:
‎他们希望以势力压倒我们
‎所以会全力迎战

translation.en: no matter how small our first advance.
Our great longbows will rain chaos on them from above.
translation.zh:
‎我们优秀的长弓
‎将从他们上方落下 造成混乱

translation.en: That chaos will be your favor.
My liege, I implore you, we mustn't... we mustn't listen to this madness.
translation.zh: ‎陛下 我恳请您不要听这般疯言疯语

translation.en: What is the true experience of this man?
He once fought for Richard many years ago.
translation.zh: ‎他多年前曾为理查国王作战

translation.en: Since then, he has done nothing...
other than ride with the companies,
robbing and tormenting.
I never robbed anyone who didn't deserve to be robbed.
translation.zh: ‎我抢过的人 都是罪有应得

translation.en: If it rains tonight,
we fight tomorrow.
If you have concocted this plan, half-baked and speculative,
translation.zh:
‎如果你编出这计划
‎尚未考虑周全 满是猜测

translation.en: merely to prove to me your worth,
translation.zh: ‎只是为了向我证明你的价值

translation.en: please say so now.
All plans are speculative.
And as I say, I only speak them when I feel them true.
translation.zh:
‎我也说过 只有我觉得正确
‎我才会开口

translation.en: This one I feel in my bones.
translation.zh: ‎这计划 我骨子里都能感觉到是对的

translation.en: This one I feel in my knee bone.
Here we are on the eve of this fight, and I am...
I am scared to wonder, to tell it true,
why we are here.
You best discover the answer for that.
The men out there deserve it.
They've given their lives to you.
I cannot say what forces have conspired to bring you here,
translation.zh: ‎我说不准是什么力量带你来到了这里

translation.en: but these men need you,
just as you need them.
These men deserve your confidence.
And if you cannot give them that,
at least then tell them a magnificent lie.
translation.zh: ‎那至少要对他们撒个弥天大谎

translation.en: Though you might not think it possible...
you are my friend.
Good night, Hal.
Sleep well.
This wind whips from the north.
The rain was sent from England.
Why are you being fitted with plate? We were to fight without armor.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么在穿盔甲？
‎我们要不带盔甲战斗

translation.en: We need a front line to draw them in.
It cannot be you.
[Falstaff] The idea was mine.
Some man must lead the first push to sell it well.
translation.zh: ‎要让大家信服 必须自己打头阵

translation.en: My men have been assembled.
And I cannot, in good conscience,
send them out there to realize my speculative drivel
translation.zh: ‎派他们去履行我的猜测蠢话

translation.en: without getting muddy alongside them, can I?
translation.zh: ‎而不和他们一起沾一身泥 对吧？

translation.en: I will fight with you.
[inhales] It's noble, but you know that cannot be.
translation.zh:
‎这样很高尚
‎但你知道这是不行的

translation.en: This is what I was built for.
I die here or... I die over a bottle in Eastcheap.
translation.zh:
‎要么死在这里
‎要么死在闹市的一瓶酒上

translation.en: And I think this makes for a much better story.
And you have things still to do.
You will join this fight.
But promise me you don't join too early.
translation.zh: ‎但答应我 不要加入得太早

translation.en: It doesn't matter what you see out there.
translation.zh: ‎你在战场看到什么 这不重要

translation.en: We must first draw them all in. All of them.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须先把他们全都吸引进来
‎全数人马

translation.en: Promise me that, Hal.
Win, my friend.
Maybe then you'll lighten enough to have a drink with me. Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎也许之后你就会有心情
‎跟我喝一杯了 是吧？

translation.en: [in French] Where is the Dauphin?
I humbly thank you for receiving me, noble lord.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢您接见我 尊贵的殿下

translation.en: [in English] Please. Please speak English.
I enjoy to speak English.
It is simple... and ugly.
I have been waiting all morning, all the night... for your surrender.
translation.zh: ‎我每日每夜一直在等着你投降

translation.en: It might have saved a great unease
had it come sooner.
I know you do not speak for your father.
I do speak for my father.
I know you do not speak for your father, so I come to you now directly.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你不代表你父亲
‎所以我直接来找了你

translation.en: I have not come to surrender.
Too much Christian blood will be spilled on this field today.
translation.zh: ‎今天战场上会有许多基督徒流血

translation.en: So, I propose this:
You and I fight, one man on one man.
We fight in our armies' stead.
If I lose, my men will leave this place forthwith and forever.
translation.zh:
‎要是我输了
‎我的手下会永远离开这里

translation.en: You will have my head.
If I win,
I will assume this kingdom's crown upon your father's death.
translation.zh: ‎我会在你父亲死后继承王位

translation.en: What say you?
Are you scared, young Henry?
What say you?
Are you scared of this battle?
There is no shame of it.
Save your men.
You save your own men.
You came here. To me!
[yells] Surrender to me!
I cannot do that.
[Dauphin] Well, then, boy,
let us make famous... that field out there.
translation.zh: ‎那我们就让这片战场闻名吧

translation.en: This little village of Agincourt,
that will forever mark the site of your callow disgrace.
translation.zh: ‎会永远让世人记住你乳臭未乾的屈辱

translation.en: You expect of me a speech?
I have only one to give,
and it is the same one I'd give
were we not standing on the brim of a battlefield.
It is the same one I'd give were we to meet in the street by chance.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们是在街头偶遇
‎我也会说同样这段话

translation.en: I have only ever hoped for one thing...
to see this kingdom united under this English crown.
translation.zh:
‎那就是看到
‎王国在这份英格兰王冠下联合起来

translation.en: All men are born to die. We know it.
translation.zh: ‎人都有一死 我们都知道

translation.en: We carry it with us always.
If your day be today, so be it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你死在今天 那又如何

translation.en: Mine will be tomorrow.
Or mine today and yours tomorrow. It matters not.
translation.zh:
‎或者我死在今天 你死在明天
‎这不重要

translation.en: What matters is that you know, in your hearts,
translation.zh: ‎重要的是 你们要在心里知道

translation.en: that today you are that kingdom united.
translation.zh: ‎今天 你们就是这个联合起来的王国

translation.en: You are England.
Each and every one of you. England is you.
translation.zh: ‎你们每一个人 都是英格兰

translation.en: And it is the space between you.
translation.zh: ‎英格兰也是你们之间的这块空间

translation.en: Fight not for yourselves, fight for that space.
translation.zh:
‎不要为自己而战
‎要为这块空间而战

translation.en: Fill that space.
Make it tissue. Make it mass.
translation.zh: ‎让其形成组织 让其形成一团

translation.en: Make it impenetrable. Make it yours!
translation.zh: ‎让其不可侵入 让其变成你们的空间

translation.en: Make it England!
Make it England!
Great men to it. Captains, lords.
translation.zh: ‎伟大之士为此而战 将士 领主

translation.en: Great men to it!
For the King and St. George!
Les imbéciles.
Archers.
[man 1] Archers!
[man 2] Archers!
[man 3] Archers! Now!
Draw!
Loose!
Halt!
Ready!
Loose!
On me!
Come then...
King of England.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
My liege.
-God save the King. -Hail the King.
Hail the King.
-Hail the King. -Hail King Henry. Hail the King.
[Westmorland] My liege. The prisoners we have took are a rabble.
translation.zh: ‎陛下 我们俘虏的人都在嚷嚷

translation.en: I fear we will not secure them should their army regroup.
translation.zh:
‎要是他们的军队再次集结
‎恐怕难以稳住他们

translation.en: Kill them all.
[in French] Your Majesty... Henry, King of England.
translation.zh: ‎陛下 英格兰国王亨利到

translation.en: [in English] Your Majesty... Come sit here with me.
Please.
I like to have the sun on my skin, but not too much.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢阳光洒在皮肤上
‎但不能太过

translation.en: Too much is very dangerous.
This conversation we are about to have...
has been had many times before,
and will be had many times again for centuries to come
translation.zh: ‎未来几百年也会再次进行许多次

translation.en: between men of vanity and men of good reason.
translation.zh: ‎双方是虚荣之人或理性之士

translation.en: I would hope that you and I are men of good reason.
I have, of course, traveled here to offer you my surrender.
translation.zh: ‎当然 我来到这里 是为了投降

translation.en: Do you ask anything of me in return?
No.
I do, however, have for you a proposition.
You take the hand of my daughter, Catherine,
in marriage.
It is most uncanny...
that the great movements of history
so frequently find their origins in the minutia of family.
translation.zh: ‎经常都是起源于 ‎家庭之琐事

translation.en: That in ways I dare not unsettle here,
my relationship with my son
and yours... with your father.
These are the things that have led us here today.
We are leaders of lands and peoples,
and yet... it is family that moves us.
translation.zh: ‎但让我们有所行动的却是家庭

translation.en: Family... consumes us.
My condolences to you...
for the loss of your friend, Sir John.
I know you must feel this loss deeply.
translation.zh: ‎我知道您一定深深感受着对他的失去

translation.en: Thank you, William.
Your loyalty to me has been comforting.
translation.zh: ‎你对我的忠诚一直让我有所慰藉

translation.en: You have proven yourself to be a most worthy king.
translation.zh:
‎你已经证明
‎自己是最配得上王冠的国王

translation.en: I would say you have proven yourself
translation.zh: ‎我会说 你已经证明自己是

translation.en: to be one of England's great kings.
[Lord Chamberlain] Your Majesty, the crowd has gathered.
So I hear.
Please sit, Your Majesty.
[in French] You are beautiful.
Merci.
I will no longer speak French.
We must speak English.
I cannot speak English.
You will learn.
I wonder, then, how our union might proceed in the meantime.
translation.zh:
‎那我想知道
‎在此期间我们的结合要怎么进行

translation.en: [in English] There is much I wonder about a great many things.
translation.zh: ‎有很多事情 我都很想知道

translation.en: [in English] Indeed there must be for you to contemplate marriage to a woman about whom...
translation.zh: ‎要与一位自己知之甚少的女人结婚

translation.en: you know so little.
I will not submit to you.
You must earn my respect.
I understand that.
Do you?
Do you feel a sense of achievement?
In what regard?
In any regard.
I have achieved that which my father never could.
translation.zh: ‎我实现了父亲无法实现的成就

translation.en: I have united this kingdom in common cause.
translation.zh: ‎我用共同事业联合起了这个王国

translation.en: You have achieved momentary respite.
translation.zh: ‎你的成就是有了暂时的喘息

translation.en: A unity forged under false pretense
will never be a unity that prevails.
How, pray, have my endeavors been forged falsely?
translation.zh: ‎我的努力怎么是伪装出来的？

translation.en: Why did you bring war to France?
Your father came on spoiling.
How so? How was he spoiling?
He sent an assassin.
There was no assassin.
There was no plot to kill you.
How might you know?
Because I was with my father when he received word of your charge.
translation.zh:
‎因为当他听到你开战的消息时
‎我就在他身边

translation.en: I know him well enough to know his reaction to be genuine.
translation.zh:
‎我对他的了解
‎足以知道他的反应是真是假

translation.en: How was his reaction?
He laughed.
He laughed very much. He said you must be drunk.
translation.zh: ‎他笑得厉害 说你肯定是醉了

translation.en: Your father is a madman.
He may be mad, but he is true.
translation.zh: ‎也许他是疯子 但他有真性情

translation.en: His madness makes him true. He says only what he believes.
translation.zh:
‎他的疯令他真实
‎他只说自己的真心话

translation.en: That is why he is loved.
The assassin then was sent by your brother.
-My brother? -Mm-hmm.
My brother was too stupid to conjure such a plan.
translation.zh: ‎我哥哥的智力 想不出这种计划

translation.en: What was your true reason?
Did you know of the ball he sent?
The ball he sent to me?
A ball?
He sent to you...
-a ball? -Why should you question my intent?
translation.zh: ‎他送了你一个球？ ‎你凭什么质疑我的意图？

translation.en: Your father's rule is illegitimate. He has no right claim to his throne.
translation.zh:
‎你父亲的统治不是正统
‎王位不该是他的

translation.en: All monarchy is illegitimate.
You yourself are the son of a usurper.
It would seem that you have no explanation for what you have done.
translation.zh: ‎看来你对自己的所为并无解释

translation.en: You have shed the blood of so many Christian souls, and yet...
translation.zh: ‎你让那么多的基督徒流血 但是…

translation.en: before me now, all I see is a... young and vain and foolish man
translation.zh:
‎我眼前看到的
‎只是一个虚荣愚蠢的年轻人

translation.en: so easily riled.
So easily beguiled.
I must leave you now.
[William] Gentle.
We must be sure to revel in this day, my friend.
translation.zh: ‎今天我们一定要狂欢作乐 朋友

translation.en: A crowd has gathered in honor of our victory.
translation.zh: ‎人群已聚集起来 庆祝我们的胜利

translation.en: These are the rare moments for which a king truly lives, I would imagine.
translation.zh:
‎这些罕见的时刻
‎才是一个国王真正喜欢的

translation.en: In all my preoccupation, I have...
translation.zh: ‎我之前太过专注 ‎都忘了问候你的家人

translation.en: neglected to ask after your family.
Your preoccupations are hardly trifling.
You have two sons.
I do.
[King Henry V] And...
your wife minds your estate in your absence.
translation.zh: ‎你不在时 是你妻子打理庄园

translation.en: [William] She does.
Yours is sheep.
You're a man of wool.
As was my father before me.
How many head?
At last count, some 4,000. Mostly Dorset Horns.
translation.zh:
‎上次数时是大约4000头
‎大多是多塞特角羊

translation.en: How much land have you?
To be true, I'm not... wholly certain, but...
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我不是完全确定

translation.en: but many... many hundreds of beautiful, beautiful acres.
What lands in France have you now annexed?
translation.zh: ‎你现在在法国获得了多少土地？

translation.en: [William] Stop.
Now that France is ours, how much of her land is now yours?
translation.zh:
‎现在法国属于我们了
‎你手里有多少法国土地？

translation.en: Oh, well... That has yet to be determined. [chuckles]
Your conquest is so recent.
-Why do you ask this question-- -Stay up there.
-Hmm? -Stay up there.
How did my assassin come to you?
translation.zh: ‎我那位刺客是怎么找到你的？

translation.en: I fail to remember the moment.
Remedy this failure.
So much has happened in the intervening months.
translation.zh: ‎中间这段时间发生了太多事

translation.en: An event as pivotal as this one
should be amply equipped to penetrate the fog of time elapsed.
No?
Of course.
Let me recall.
Was it in the street?
Did he come to you in the street?
Yes. Yes, it was in the street.
He approached me... [inhales] most unusually.
My liege, please, tell me the cause of this concern.
translation.zh: ‎陛下 请告诉我 您为何担心这事

translation.en: Stay up there.
Stay up there.
Did he know your name?
I don't believe he did.
How, then, did he know who you were to approach?
The memory is returning.
He surrendered himself to palace guards
and the matter was brought to my attention. I was taken to him.
translation.zh:
‎这事上报到了我这里
‎我就被带去见他了

translation.en: So, he did not come to you in the street.
translation.zh: ‎所以他不是在街头找到了你

translation.en: No. No, it was not in the street. Forgive me.
translation.zh: ‎不是的 不是在街头 请原谅我

translation.en: I was summoned to his cell.
Has a problem arisen...
Hal?
Yes. A problem has arisen.
And it wobbles before me now on its silly little stool
translation.zh:
‎而且这问题
‎现在就在我眼前一张笨凳子上

translation.en: -at mine own elevation. -I'm afraid I don't understand.
-Please, please, stop this charade. -Sincerely, I do not understand.
translation.zh:
‎-别再装模作样了
‎-我真的不明白

translation.en: [yells] Stop the fucking charade! Stop it!
[yells] I have given you what you wanted, boy!
translation.zh: ‎我把你想要的东西给你了 小子

translation.en: Have I not?!
You wanted peace. [yells] Did you not?!
This is how peace is forged.
It is forged in victory.
Listen.
That is the sound of peace.
That is the sound of your peace.
That is the sound of your greatness.
I ask nothing of you...
only that you will always speak to me clear and true.
translation.zh: ‎只希望你能一直对我清楚说出实话

translation.en: Always.
Will you promise me only that?
-[crowd] Long live the King! -I will.
[man] King Henry!
[crowd] King Henry!  King Henry!
